name: PTZ_Overflow_Tracking_Jam
description: Rapid IR pulses create multiple false targets, overflow PTZ tracking buffer
expected_result: PTZ camera loses tracking lock, hunts between phantom targets. Manual override required to reset. Pan/tilt motors may overheat after 5+ minutes continuous operation.
limitations: Only affects PTZ cameras with IR-based motion tracking. Optical/Pixel-based tracking immune. Requires 20+ pulses to overflow typical 16-target buffer. Motor thermal protection may engage.
